page.title: 04FASHION
page.content: Punks are a group of people who stand out from the rest of the crowd.Their clothes are usually dark leather or baggy.The girls wear short,black,leather skirts,with dog chains or spiked belts.They wear fish-net tights,with black pointed boots.The boys have very tight trousers,leather.They have spiked bracelets,and baggy tops.For shoes they have Doctor Martin's boots,which are a very good quality shoe.Their hair is what makes them stand out:they have different colour hair,and very unusual styles. Many people look down on punks because of their appearance.They are often turned down for jobs,and are blamed for vandalism.People think they are violent trouble makers,but the majority are very pleasant. By J.Hill
